citations.narrative:
The Licensee does not maintain complete medical records for all adult dogs. There were no records for the Distemper,
Parvovirus, and Rabies vaccines the licensee administered last year to the following adult dogs:
- Adult female Shih Tzu #4937, Adult female Shih Tzu #4939.
Failure to maintain adequate medical records may interfere with the ability of APHIS officials to determine if the animals
are receiving adequate veterinary care. Complete medical records must be maintained and include the names of all
vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of administration. Correct by documenting all treatments given and
ensure that medical records are complete and contain the required information. Correct by 25-FEB-2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative.
n

narrative:
3.13(b)(3) 
   
Veterinary care for dogs. 
The Licensee does not maintain complete medical records for all adult dogs. There were no records for the Distemper, 
Parvovirus, and Rabies vaccines the licensee administered last year to the following adult dogs: 
 
- Adult female Shih Tzu #4937, Adult female Shih Tzu #4939. 
 
Failure to maintain adequate medical records may interfere with the ability of APHIS officials to determine if the animals 
are receiving adequate veterinary care. Complete medical records must be maintained and include the names of all 
vaccines and treatments administered and the dates of administration. Correct by documenting all treatments given and 
ensure that medical records are complete and contain the required information. Correct by 25-FEB-2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a Facility Representative. 
 
 n
